import React from 'react' import { RepeatWrapping } from 'three' const DisplayCards = (props) => { return ( <>
{props.location.location}

{props.location.city}

{props.location.rating} Stars

    {showUpdateForm ?
    {handleUpdateForm(location)}}> location:
    city:
    zip:
    description:
    image:
    rating:
    tags:
    : }
) } export default DisplayCards
